test_cases.description: Successfully create a new task with valid fields and location 'ames'.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_all_fields_location_ames

test_setup.given: A valid user and all required fields.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with valid data and location 'ames'.

test_cases.description: Successfully create a new task with valid fields and location 'boone'.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_all_fields_location_boone

test_setup.given: A valid user and all required fields.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with valid data and location 'boone'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with an unsupported location value.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_invalid_location

test_setup.given: A valid user and all required fields except location is invalid.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with location 'desmoines'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with missing 'title' field.
test_cases.name: create_task_missing_title

test_setup.given: A valid user and all fields except title.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with missing 'title'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with missing 'description' field.
test_cases.name: create_task_missing_description

test_setup.given: A valid user and all fields except description.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with missing 'description'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with missing 'priority' field.
test_cases.name: create_task_missing_priority

test_setup.given: A valid user and all fields except priority.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with missing 'priority'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with missing 'due_date' field.
test_cases.name: create_task_missing_due_date

test_setup.given: A valid user and all fields except due_date.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with missing 'due_date'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with missing 'user_name' field.
test_cases.name: create_task_missing_user_name

test_setup.given: All fields except user_name.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with missing 'user_name'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with missing 'location' field.
test_cases.name: create_task_missing_location

test_setup.given: All fields except location.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with missing 'location'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with an empty string for 'title'.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_empty_title

test_setup.given: All fields present but title is an empty string.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with empty 'title'.

test_cases.description: Successfully create a task with 'priority' as a numeric string.
test_cases.name: create_task_priority_as_string_number

test_setup.given: All fields present, priority is a string representing a number.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with priority '1' as string.

test_cases.description: Successfully create a task with 'priority' as integer.
test_cases.name: create_task_priority_as_integer

test_setup.given: All fields present, priority is integer.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with priority 3 as integer.

test_cases.description: Successfully create a task with due_date in ISO 8601 format.
test_cases.name: create_task_due_date_iso8601

test_setup.given: All fields present, due_date in ISO 8601.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with an invalid due_date format.
test_cases.name: create_task_due_date_invalid_format

test_setup.given: due_date not in ISO 8601 format.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with location 'Ames' (case sensitivity test).
test_cases.name: create_task_location_case_sensitivity

test_setup.given: All fields present, location in wrong case.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with location 'Ames'.

test_cases.description: Create a task with an extra field in the request. Extra fields should be ignored.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_additional_field

test_setup.given: Request includes an additional, unexpected field.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Extra field is ignored in response.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called.

test_cases.description: Create a task with a very long title (e.g., 255 chars).
test_cases.name: create_task_with_large_title

test_setup.given: All fields present, title is 255 characters.
test_setup.then: Task is created successfully.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called.

test_cases.description: Verify that a task can be successfully created when all required fields are provided with valid values.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Valid Input

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: Task is created and returned in the response with status 201.
test_setup.when: A valid POST request is sent to /tasks with all required fields.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error when the title field is missing from the request.
test_cases.name: Create Task Missing Title

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating the missing title field is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks without the title field.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error when the description field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task Missing Description

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating the missing description field is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks without the description field.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error when the priority field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task Missing Priority

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating the missing priority field is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks without the priority field.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error when the due_date field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task Missing Due Date

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating the missing due_date field is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks without the due_date field.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error when the user_name field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task Missing User Name

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating the missing user_name field is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks without the user_name field.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error indicating all missing required fields when more than one field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task Multiple Fields Missing

response_body_json.error: Missing required fields: title, due_date, user_name

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 listing all missing fields is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks with multiple required fields missing.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error when the title field is present but empty.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Empty Title

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating the title cannot be empty is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks with an empty title.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error when due_date is not in a valid date format.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Invalid due_date Format

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating invalid due_date format is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks with an invalid due_date format.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error when priority is not within the accepted values.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Invalid Priority Value

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating invalid priority value is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks with an invalid priority value.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API ignores or returns error for extra fields that are not part of the TaskCreate schema.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Extra Field

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: Task is created with status 201 and the extra field is ignored in the response.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks with an extra field in the payload.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API can handle a very long title (e.g., 255 characters) if allowed by the schema.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Very Long Title

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: Task is created and returned in the response with status 201.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks with a 255 character title.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API returns an error if the Content-Type header is not application/json.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Invalid Content-Type Header

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: An error response with status 400 indicating the Content-Type must be application/json is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks with a non-JSON Content-Type header.

test_cases.description: Verify that the API allows or rejects creating duplicate tasks based on system policy (assume duplicates are allowed).
test_cases.name: Create Duplicate Task

test_setup.given: A task with identical details already exists.
test_setup.then: A new task is created and returned with status 201 (if duplicates are allowed).
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /tasks with the same details as an existing task.
